entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Buffalo Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:23 p.m. CST Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 10.1Â°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Local smoke. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low 6.
